column4: Hi all. I have got 5.10 Breezy running and I'm having trouble getting X to use the proper video driver. I have an intel mobo /w the i865 chipset. dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg does not seem to fix anything (i865 isn't in the controller list)
have you tried the vesa driver?
is that the driver I should be using with this chipset ?
it's sort of like the "failsafe"  almost every card should at least be able to get into X with it
